name: Dragon Warrior: Legend's World
description:
DRAGON WARRIOR: Legend's World

The game which is the most attractive action-game is official available on Google Play.

DRAGON WARRIOR: Legend's World is one of the action games based on the fictional plot. Gamers will get under the skin of main character to cross the lands and fight against the different monsters. In total process of playing game, players can upgrade power for character by collecting the coin and buy the kinds of items. There are many weapons and armors with the typical features so that players can choose.

In addition, the game has many special skills, they helps gamers to increase the ability in fighting. Moreover, you must practice and use the fight skill so that you can avoid the dangerous knock's monsters.

DRAGON WARRIOR: Legend's World will bring you the brand new experience. You will take part in the violent battles to save the hope's life. Let joining the game to show your awesome skill in playing the game.

With the beautiful graphic and the lively sound, DRAGON WARRIOR: Legend's World will help you to have the wonderful entertaining moments.

The game DRAGON WARRIOR: Legend's World is official available on Google Play. You all can download this game on Google Play to begin the new battle.
